EmailTemplate.description: Email Template used when forwarding a Quote request (in an email) to CSSC.
EmailTemplate.name: Forward EmailQuote
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote Email ({!Case.Subject})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Please process the request for quote in the email below.
Plant: Ship To: YO:
For questions please contact {!Case.OwnerFullName} and reference case number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thanks!
